noun.description: Any of various long-eared, long-tailed Australian rodents of the former genus Hapalotis (family Muridae), now placed in the genera Notomys (hopping mice) and Conilurus (rabbit rats).

origin: Mid 19th century. From scientific Latin Hapalotis, former genus name from ancient Greek ἁπαλός soft (of unknown origin) + οὐτ-, οὖς ear.
